channel.title: [PI] need help plz(:
channel.description:
yo wht up guys? i have a question that i need answered. ok so i have this mini game i made and when they talk to a guy they get teled to the place, he gives 4 keys for the chests down in my mini game, ppl can easly just tele home to get more. how can i make it so if they click the home button in the magic ook it will delete the keys in there invo if not used? hope i made this as clear as i could. hope someone could help(:
Also im giving my lvl 89 rs account for someone to add a point system to my rsps for more info about that hit me up at Killers_life2go@hotmail.com i am always on thx once again(:

item.title: [PI] need help plz(:
item.dc:creator: @killershand6 killershand6
item.description:
@killershand6 wrote:

thx and one more thing for my quest tab thing i dont know how to edit wht they say public static void questTab(RSFont[] TDA){
RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(638);
setChildren(7, Interface);
addText(19155, " Assassin’s DreamScape", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
addButton(19156, 1, “Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST”, 18, 18, “Server Info”, 1);
addSprite(19157, 5, “Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST”);
addSprite(19158, 4, “Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST”);
removeSomething(19156);
addText(19159, “Pc Points:”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 0);
removeSomething(19159);
setBounds(19155, 4, 2, 0, Interface);
setBounds(19156, 170, 2, 1, Interface);
setBounds(19157, 0, 24, 2, Interface);
setBounds(19158, 0, 22, 3, Interface);
setBounds(19158, 0, 242, 4, Interface);
setBounds(19159, 4, 246, 5, Interface);
setBounds(19160, 0, 24, 6, Interface);
Interface = addTabInterface(19160);
Interface.scrollMax = 1700;
Interface.height = 218;
Interface.width = 174;
setChildren(105, Interface);
addText(19161, “Special Event”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
addText(19162, “None”, 0xFF0000, false, true, -1, TDA, 1, 0xFFFFFF);
addText(19163, “Special Quest”, 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2);
addText(19164, “None”, 0xFF0000, false, true, -1, TDA, 1, 0xFFFFFF);
setBounds(19161, 4, 4, 0, Interface);
setBounds(19162, 8, 20, 1, Interface);
setBounds(19163, 4, 35, 2, Interface);
setBounds(19164, 8, 51, 3, Interface);
setBounds(663, 4, 67, 4, Interface);
int Y = 83;
int frame = 5;
for(int i = 16026; i <= 16125;i++){
addText(i, “”+i, 0xFF0000, false, true, -1, TDA, 0, 0xFFFFFF);
setBounds(i, 8, Y, frame, Interface);
frame++;
Y += 15;
Y++;
}
}[/code] i dont know how to edit that its on client side

item.title: [PI] need help plz(:
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You probably have a method that handles all teleports. (Probably the button clicking packet…)

switch(buttonID) { case x: break; // etc. }

Under ‘case x’ add something like:

case x: if(inArea) { // Teleportation.. // Delete the 4 items. // sendMsg("The keys vanish because blah blah blah."); // Stuff that's already there. }

Then, just define ‘inArea()’ –

public void inArea() { // Coordinates, etc. }

Sorry for horrible conventions.

Read full topic
